segments.advisor_message: Thank you for joining me today. Before we get started, could you please confirm your full name for our records? It helps us to ensure accuracy in managing your information.
segments.client_message: Of course! My name is Sarah Jane Thompson. But I usually go by Sarah, so you can just call me that.

segments.advisor_message: Great, thank you, Sarah. And what about your date of birth? This will help us in verifying your identity and providing tailored advice.
segments.client_message: Sure! I was born on the 15th of July, 1985, so that's 15-07-1985. Anything else you need from me?
